name: Bounce Back (Bbomb11)
description:
Bounce Bounce Bounce Back

Bounce Back is a chaotic game originaly made for the brackeys jam, but after I missed the deadline I finished it two days later.

Controls: Hold the left mouse button to move toward the cursor.

Don't hit the walls

Bullets don't hurt, but they do bounce you back!

It's not the best game I've made, but it's a'ight.

Made with love :)
